snippet: No charges will be filed against a grieving man who sprinkled some of his dead fiancée’s ashes near an eyewear store, causing a Sarasota mall to be evacuated, the police said.
abstract: Police in Sarasota, Fla, say no charges will be filed against a grieving man who sprinkled some of his dead fiancee's ashes near an eyewear store, causing a mall to be evacuated and shut down for two hours.
lead_paragraph: No charges will be filed against a grieving man who sprinkled some of his dead fiancée’s ashes near an eyewear store, causing a Sarasota mall to be evacuated, the police said.
